RESThub framework 1.0 API

Packages
org.resthub.core.context Provides helpers to scan annotations to add them in RESThub context
org.resthub.core.context.config Configuration for RESThub context
org.resthub.core.context.jaxb Context scanning implementation for JAXB elements
org.resthub.core.context.persistence Context scanning implementation for JPA2 entities
org.resthub.core.dao Provides generic DAO's for CRUD operations
org.resthub.core.exception This package provides Resthub custom exceptions
org.resthub.core.model This package provides reusable model classes
org.resthub.core.service Provides generic service classes for CRUD operations.
org.resthub.core.test Reusable base test classes
org.resthub.core.test.dao Reusable classes for testing your generic DAO's
org.resthub.core.test.service Reusable classes for testing your generic services
org.resthub.core.tools Development tooling intended to improve efficiency.
org.resthub.core.util Static utils classes
org.resthub.oauth2.common.exception Exception for OAuth2 common module
org.resthub.oauth2.common.front.model Front model classed as described in the OAuth 2 specification
org.resthub.oauth2.common.model Model classed as described in the OAuth 2 specification
org.resthub.oauth2.filter.front OAuth 2 servlet filters
org.resthub.oauth2.filter.service OAuth 2 services used in servlet filters
org.resthub.oauth2.provider.dao DAO for OAuth 2 provider (token persistence)
org.resthub.oauth2.provider.service Service layer for OAuth 2 provider
org.resthub.oauth2.provider.web Webservice controllers for OAuth 2 provider
org.resthub.oauth2.utils OAuth 2 utils
org.resthub.tapestry5.components.mixins Provides resthub mixins for Tapestry5
org.resthub.tapestry5.components.mixins.service Provides commons services, i.e.
org.resthub.tapestry5.jpa.services Provides resthub services and configurations for Tapestry5 and jpa integration in a "resthub way"
org.resthub.tapestry5.security Provides utilities for Tapestry5 and SpringSecurity integration
org.resthub.tapestry5.security.services Provides resthub services and configurations for Tapestry5 and spring security integration in a "resthub way"
org.resthub.tapestry5.services Provides resthub services and configurations for Tapestry5 integration on resthub stack
org.resthub.tapestry5.validation.services Provides resthub services and configuration for Tapestry5 bean validation integration
org.resthub.web.controller Generic REST controllers
org.resthub.web.jackson Jackson integration related classes
org.resthub.web.response Response wrapper classes
org.resthub.web.test Reusable base web test classes
org.resthub.web.test.controller Reusable base web test classes for generic controllers
org.resthub.web.test.jaxb Reusable base web test classes for JAXB anotated classes
